structure.unit: Chapter 33B AREAS OF CRITICAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERN

text.section:
Sec. 33B-4. Adoption of administrative procedures.
The Board of County Commissioners shall adopt by ordinance such administrative procedures as may be necessary to measure the impact on the natural and human environment of requested changes in land use in areas of critical environmental concern and to take such other measures as are necessary for the protection of the public. (Ord. No. 75-49, ยง 4, 6-19-75)
